CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, pg. 12, reads: "Tradition - Mr. and Mrs. Albert Thompson of 2332 La Place Street, and their daughters, Alberta, Vera and Barbara, enjoy the first peace-time Christmas in four years in traditional style as they gather around the tree to open and admire the gifts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Thompson family, including daughters Alberta Thomposon, Vera Thompson (Matthews), and Barbara Thompson (Mason); Albert Thompson, and Mrs. Thompson gathered around Christmas tree with toys, in their home at 2332 La Place Street
